title: Relentless
description: Lorena was furious after the boys humiliated her in the worst way, but she slowly began to forgive them. Maybe she gave in too easily? And Shelly? That evil heifer is always up to tricks but Lorena isn't one for playing the victim, not after what she's been through. With a trip to Vegas ahead and more partying than studying, it's only a matter of time before something terrible happens to blow away all of Lorena's hard work.  Will The Boys be by her side or will they side with the enemy?  Relentless is the third book in the Edson Woods Prep series. Priceless and Blameless must be read first.â€¨ Edson Woods Prep is an upper YA/NA bully romance series.
author: J.     Swift
